title: WTF is this riot!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
body: I get banned for playing a game when a troller (Nunu/Lucian) comes along and takes all my camps and i was unable to level up or get items cause they followed me around the whole game and took everything making me  useless and i get banned yes i said a couple of things i shouldn't have but why am i banned for this when they are the ones that trolled and ruined the game in the first place not fucking happy!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

> [{quoted}](name=ThatsBS,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rnxeEJgz,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-11-19T22:39:26.529+0000)
>
> Was this a ranked game?

yes it was.

Well fair enough you were fuming, but in saying that, expressing your thoughts to them would of only enraged the situation. If you took the passive approach they may of given up (Or not). Now they have probably got what they wanted from you. (No doubt it wasn't their main account they care about as well). 
Lesson learnt I hope. You cant vent your frustration at all on chat, because you will be held accountable for what you have done regardless of what they may have done to you.

In saying that, if you feel a neutral party being Riot would see your side, you can send in a support ticket with your version and evidence of that game. They may lift your last ban etc. (As its an automated system ban).

Though it's worth noting they cannot lift perma bans. Not will not but actually cannot as far as I know. Their system does not allow it. That's why they're so careful with the perma bans, because if it's not legit they can't fix it.

It wasn't a permaban it was a 14 day ban which i find weird and yet no answer from riot. And i have to put in  i asked the other team and my other 2 team mates if they could please report nunu and lucain and near the end of the game nunu and lucian called me toxic after the whole game swearing and saying that he has done nothing when he ruined the game and made us lose and then they cry about how i was being so toxic which i find funny cause everyone would a little salty i got so angry that i just muted them the whole game from 15 mins till 45 mins where we lost and in the end game lobby they all reported me for verbal abuse.  (He didn't get his role he wanted cause he was last pick so he went trolling) But hay everyone likes it when riot sticks up for trollers in League……  Right??

Well they could have very well been punished too, I wouldn't know. What I can say is you should have been emailed a reform card, if you got it it should theoretically demonstrate why you were punished (I believe the system is more aware of people on repeat offences so that could be part of it) and theoretically you'll know what you did wrong. If you didn't get one then send in a ticket cause you should have. 'Fraid that's all I've got for you, but good luck :)
